item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Hi Astrid I used my ice cream makers to churn the ice cream, rather than a Pacojet. I cut the ice cream using cookie or scone cutters so that they would fit into the shells. Thanks Anita
item.content:encoded:
Hi Astrid
I used my ice cream makers to churn the ice cream, rather than a Pacojet. I cut the ice cream using cookie or scone cutters so that they would fit into the shells.
Thanks
Anita

item.title: By: Astrid
item.dc:creator: Astrid
item.description: How do you shape both ice creams to the shape you want? Any tips when I don't have a Pacojet?
item.content:encoded: How do you shape both ice creams to the shape you want? Any tips when I don’t have a Pacojet?

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gaytime-goes-nuts/comment-page-1/#comment-6619">Michael</a>.
I bought a summer roll for the nougat, and chopped off the chocolate and coconut. You could make nougat - or possibly buy it at Essential Ingredient?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Michael.

I bought a summer roll for the nougat, and chopped off the chocolate and coconut. You could make nougat – or possibly buy it at Essential Ingredient?
